prompt: What herbivorous animal features a distinctive, long trunk?
icl_complete: A herbivorous animal that features a distinctive, long trunk is the tapir. Tapirs use their long, flexible snouts to grab leaves, fruit, and other vegetation, aiding in feeding in dense forests and marshes. They are found in parts of Central and South America, as well as Southeast Asia.
